name: Tower Of Perss
description:
Game made by two friends for Game Maker's Toolkit Jam 2020.

When you build a tower you don't have control over which tower will come.
You can recycle these tower to gain itens.

W. S. A. D. keys: Move
F: Put Towers
E: Throw items.

It's your first Game Jam, don't expect too much from the game.
SrLmo: Programming
Pin803: Pixel Art.
